title: StaticConfig
description: The `komorebi.json` static configuration file reference for `v0.1.39`

border.description: Display an active window border (default: true)

border_colours.description: Active window border colours for different container types

floating.description: Border colour when the container is in floating mode

monocle.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode

single.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window

stack.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows

unfocused.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused

unfocused_locked.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked

cross_boundary_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when an action is called on a window at a monitor boundary (default: Monitor)

oneOf.description: Attempt to perform actions across a workspace boundary
Attempt to perform actions across a monitor boundary

cross_monitor_move_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when a window is moved across a monitor boundary (default: Swap)

oneOf.description: Swap the window container with the window container at the edge of the adjacent monitor
Insert the window container into the focused workspace on the adjacent monitor
Do nothing if trying to move a window container in the direction of an adjacent monitor

default_workspace_padding.description: Add transparency to unfocused windows (default: false) Global default workspace padding (default: 10)

float_override.description: Enable or disable float override, which makes it so every new window opens in floating mode (default: false)

float_override_placement.description: Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window with float override active (default: None)

oneOf.description: Does not change the size or position of the window
Center the window without changing the size
Center the window and resize it according to the `AspectRatio`

float_rule_placement.description: Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window that matches a 'floating_applications' rule (default: None)

oneOf.description: Does not change the size or position of the window
Center the window without changing the size
Center the window and resize it according to the `AspectRatio`

floating_applications.description: Identify applications which should be managed as floating windows

floating_layer_behaviour.description: Determines what happens on a new window when on the `FloatingLayer` (default: Tile)

oneOf.description: Tile new windows (unless they match a float rule or float override is active)
Float new windows

floating_layer_placement.description: Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window on the floating layer with the `FloatingLayerBehaviour` set to `FloatingLayerBehaviour::Float` (default: Center)

oneOf.description: Does not change the size or position of the window
Center the window without changing the size
Center the window and resize it according to the `AspectRatio`

floating_window_aspect_ratio.description: Identify applications which are slow to send initial event notifications Aspect ratio to resize with when toggling floating mode for a window

global_work_area_offset.description: Global work area (space used for tiling) offset (default: None)

layered_applications.description: Identify applications that have the WS_EX_LAYERED extended window style

floating_layer_behaviour.description: Determine what happens to a new window when the Floating workspace layer is active (default: Tile)

oneOf.description: Tile new windows (unless they match a float rule or float override is active)
Float new windows

wallpaper.description: Specify a wallpaper for this monitor

generate_theme.description: Generate and apply Base16 theme for this wallpaper (default: true)

path.description: Path to the wallpaper image file

theme_options.description: Specify Light or Dark variant for theme generation (default: Dark)

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Base09)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Base0F)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Base0D)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Base0B)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Base0B)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Base05)

theme_variant.description: Specify Light or Dark variant for theme generation (default: Dark)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base01)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Base08)

window_based_work_area_offset.description: Window based work area offset (default: None)

window_based_work_area_offset_limit.description: Open window limit after which the window based work area offset will no longer be applied (default: 1)

window_hiding_position.description: Determine which position windows should be hidden at on this monitor

oneOf.description: Hide windows in the bottom left corner of the screen
Hide windows in the bottom right corner of the screen

apply_window_based_work_area_offset.description: Apply this monitor's window-based work area offset (default: true)

custom_layout.description: END OF LIFE FEATURE: Custom Layout (default: None)

float_override.description: Enable or disable float override, which makes it so every new window opens in floating mode (default: false)

floating_layer_behaviour.description: Determine what happens to a new window when the Floating workspace layer is active (default: Tile)

oneOf.description: Tile new windows (unless they match a float rule or float override is active)
Float new windows

layout_flip.description: Specify an axis on which to flip the selected layout (default: None)

grid.description: Options related to the Grid layout

rows.description: Maximum number of rows per grid column

scrolling.description: Options related to the Scrolling layout

center_focused_column.description: With an odd number of visible columns, keep the focused window column centered

layout_rules.description: Layout rules in the format of threshold => layout (default: None)

tile.description: Enable or disable tiling for the workspace (default: true)

wallpaper.description: Specify a wallpaper for this workspace

generate_theme.description: Generate and apply Base16 theme for this wallpaper (default: true)

path.description: Path to the wallpaper image file

theme_options.description: Specify Light or Dark variant for theme generation (default: Dark)

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Base09)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Base0F)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Base0D)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Base0B)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Base0B)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Base05)

theme_variant.description: Specify Light or Dark variant for theme generation (default: Dark)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base01)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Base08)

window_container_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when a new window is opened (default: Create)

oneOf.description: Create a new container for each new window
Append new windows to the focused window container

window_container_behaviour_rules.description: Window container behaviour rules in the format of threshold => behaviour (default: None)

oneOf.description: Create a new container for each new window
Append new windows to the focused window container

work_area_offset.description: Workspace specific work area offset (default: None)

mouse_follows_focus.description: Enable or disable mouse follows focus (default: true)

object_name_change_applications.description: Identify applications that send EVENT_OBJECT_NAMECHANGE on launch (very rare)

object_name_change_title_ignore_list.description: Do not process EVENT_OBJECT_NAMECHANGE events as Show events for identified applications matching these title regexes

oneOf.description: A theme from catppuccin-egui

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Yellow)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Pink)

name.description: Name of the Catppuccin theme (theme previews: https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Blue)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Green)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Green)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Text)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Red)

oneOf.description: A theme from base16-egui-themes

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Base09)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Base0F)

name.description: Name of the Base16 theme (theme previews: https://tinted-theming.github.io/tinted-gallery/)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Base0D)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Base0B)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Base0B)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Base05)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base01)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Base08)

oneOf.description: A custom Base16 theme

colours.description: Colours of the custom Base16 theme palette

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Base09)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Base0F)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Base0D)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Base0B)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Base0B)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Base05)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base01)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Base08)

toggle_float_placement.description: Determines the placement of a new window when toggling to float (default: CenterAndResize)

oneOf.description: Does not change the size or position of the window
Center the window without changing the size
Center the window and resize it according to the `AspectRatio`

unmanaged_window_operation_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when commands are sent while an unmanaged window is in the foreground (default: Op)

oneOf.description: Process komorebic commands on temporarily unmanaged/floated windows
Ignore komorebic commands on temporarily unmanaged/floated windows

window_container_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when a new window is opened (default: Create)

oneOf.description: Create a new container for each new window
Append new windows to the focused window container
